main event: A circular object with square rectangular outline was observed in Amityville, New York on 31 October 1955.
interesting points: The object was first observed at a distance of 12 miles away and appeared circular with a square rectangular outline., It emitted a white pulsating light on the ends and an orange or reddish light in the center., The observation lasted approximately 15 minutes without any sound or trail., The object was not traveling at high speed and disappeared immediately from sight., Weather conditions were noted with 15 miles visibility and broken clouds at 8900 feet.
sighted object: circular object with square rectangular outline
witness description: Two individuals from Amityville, aged 21 and 23 years
